content: {"name": "Catholic Charities Archdiocese of Washington, Susan Denison Mona Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Starting July 2023, the program transitioned from hot meals every Tuesday evening to a grocery package that includes 7 to 10lbs. of frozen proteins and 12 to 15lb. of fresh fruits and vegetables. This now takes place once a month on Tuesdays.\n\nThe following dates for the rest of the year are **September 26th,  October 31st, November 21st, December 19th 2023**. The distribution will begin at 5:00pm and end at 6:15pm. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.catholiccharitiesdc.org/about-us/our-locations/our-locations-mona-center/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5859 Allentown Way", "address_2": null, "city": "Temple Hills", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20748", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.80064, "longitude": -76.90577}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 772-4352", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Follow the distribution line"}]}
